snippet.title: Super Duper Multitasking Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
yyrgames.com - Unlock your hidden potential!  Using an intuitive interface and your amazing gaming skills, you'll learn to play 3, 4, or ever 5 minigames at the same time!  Tickle your brain, challenge yourself, enjoy with your friends, or wow your streaming audience!  
Tons of modes and features make Super Duper Multitasking infinitely replayable, such as a 2-player head-to-head Versus mode, 100 scripted Missions that start easy and then get WILD, and crazy Bonus modes including a brick-breaker, a space shooter, and the insane dancepad-compatible Workout Mode!  All of this was developed by just one crazy guy over the course of 10 years!  
Super Duper Multitasking is available NOW! https://store.steampowered.com/app/640290/
